ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides tools for probabilistic taxon assignment with informatic sequence classification trees. See Wilkinson et al (2018) <doi:10.7287/peerj.preprints.26812v1>.
Provides tools for probabilistic taxon assignment with informatic sequence classification trees. See Wilkinson et al (2018) <doi:10.7287/peerj.preprints.26812v1>.

name: r-insect
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.4.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-insect
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/insect_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/insect/insect_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6df52d792632c4be780621c8f7bad3e0f6956eca9b5a625733da8b86b68181d1

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rann
    - r-ape >=3.0.0
    - r-aphid >=1.3.1
    - r-kmer >=1.1.0
    - r-openssl
    - r-phylogram >=2.0.0
    - r-seqinr
    - r-xml2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rann
    - r-ape >=3.0.0
    - r-aphid >=1.3.1
    - r-kmer >=1.1.0
    - r-openssl
    - r-phylogram >=2.0.0
    - r-seqinr
    - r-xml2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('insect')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('insect')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/shaunpwilkinson/insect
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Provides tools for probabilistic taxon assignment with informatic sequence classification
    trees. See Wilkinson et al (2018) <doi:10.7287/peerj.preprints.26812v1>.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - mhoban

# Package: insect
# Type: Package
# Title: Informatic Sequence Classification Trees
# Version: 1.4.4
# Authors@R: person("Shaun", "Wilkinson", email = "shaunpwilkinson@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Author: Shaun Wilkinson [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Shaun Wilkinson <shaunpwilkinson@gmail.com>
# Description: Provides tools for probabilistic taxon assignment with informatic sequence classification trees. See Wilkinson et al (2018) <doi:10.7287/peerj.preprints.26812v1>.
# License: GPL-3
# LazyData: TRUE
# URL: https://github.com/shaunpwilkinson/insect
# BugReports: https://github.com/shaunpwilkinson/insect/issues
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Imports: ape (>= 3.0.0), aphid (>= 1.3.1), kmer (>= 1.1.0), openssl, phylogram (>= 2.0.0), RANN, seqinr, stats, utils, xml2
# Suggests: knitr, rmarkdown, testthat
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# RoxygenNote: 7.3.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2025-05-24 07:46:19 UTC; ShaunWilkinson
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2025-05-24 08:10:02 UTC
